mapper.select: select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_image, p.product_price, p.is_sales, p.description, p.customer_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.product_details, p.is_container from mst_product p;
select product_id from mst_product order by product_id desc limit 1;

select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_image, p.product_price, p.is_sales, p.description, p.customer_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.product_details, p.is_container from mst_product p where p.product_id = #{productId};

select p.product_id, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.product_image, p.product_price, p.is_sales, p.description, p.customer_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at, c.customer_name, p.product_details, p.is_container from mst_product p left join mst_customer c on p.customer_id = c.customer_id order by (product_id) desc Limit #{offset}, 10;

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.product_image, p.product_price, p.is_sales, p.description, p.customer_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at, c.customer_name, p.product_details, p.is_container FROM mst_product p left join mst_customer c on p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE p.product_name LIKE #{productName};
mapper.update: UPDATE mst_product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_image = case when #{productImage} = '../images/null' then product_image else #{productImage} end, description = #{description}, is_sales = #{isSales}, customer_id = case when #{customerId} is null then customer_id else #{customerId} end, is_container = #{isContainer} WHERE product_id = #{productId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mst_product(product_name, product_price, product_image, description, is_sales) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productImage}, #{description}, #{isSales});
INSERT INTO mst_product_detail(product_id, product_component, qty) VALUES (#{productId}, #{productComponent}, #{qty});
